1.text: And Jehovah will answer Job, and he will say,

2.text: Shall he contending with the Almighty, instruct? he reproving God shall answer it.

3.text: And Job will answer Jehovah, and say,

4.text: Behold, I was vile; what shall I turn back to thee? I put my hand to my mouth.

5.text: Once I sake, and I will not answer: and twice, and I will not add.

6.text: And Jehovah will answer Job from the whirlwind, and he will say,

7.text: Gird up now thy loins as a man; I will ask thee, and do thou make known to me.

8.text: Wilt thou also annul my judgment? wilt thou condemn me so that thou shalt be just?

9.text: And if an arm to thee as God? and with thy voice wilt thou thunder as he?

10.text: Deck thyself now with majesty and grandeur, and thou shalt put on ornament and splendor.

11.text: Scatter the overflowings of thine anger, and see every proud one and bring him low.

12.text: See every proud one, and humble him; and crush the unjust in their place.

13.text: Hide them in the dust together, and bind their faces in hiding.

14.text: And also I will confess to thee that thy right hand shall save for thee.

15.text: Behold now, the great beast which I made with thee; he will eat grass as an ox.

16.text: Behold now, his strength in his loins, and his power in the sinews of his belly.

17.text: He will bend his tail as a cedar; the sinews of his thighs will be woven together.

18.text: His bones tubes of brass; his bones as a hammered bar of iron.

19.text: He the chief of the ways of God: he making him, his sword will reach.

20.text: For the mountains shall lift up produce for him, and all the beasts of the field shall play there.

21.text: He will lie down under the shades, in the covering of the reed and marsh.

22.text: The shades shall cover him with their shadow; the willows of the torrent shall surround him.

23.text: Behold, he will oppress a river, and he will not spring up: he will trust that Jordan burst forth into his mouth.

24.text: He will take it with his eyes: his nose will pierce through snares.
